email.resetPasswordBody:
Reset your password for Crims City

Hey there! Forgot the key to your virtual office in Crims City? Don't worry, you can easily reset your password using this link:

Reset Password

Clicking the link will take you to a page where you can set a new password.

Remember to use a strong and unique password to protect your account.
